## Shape.AlternativeText property

Returns or sets the descriptive (alternative) text string of the [`Shape`](../../shape) object.

```csharp
public string AlternativeText { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp
[C#]
shape.AlternativeText = "a rectangle";
```
